sections.heading: 01|Street railway - indeterminate permit definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections745.01to745.14, inclusive, of the Revised Code:(A) "Public utility" means any street railway operated in whole or in

sections.heading: 13, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not deprive any municipal corporation of its rights to prescribe, by charter, any other methods or terms according to and upon which indeterminate permits may be granted in such municipal corporation
sections.text: 13, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not deprive any municipal corporation of its rights to prescribe, by charter, any other methods or terms according to and upon which indeterminate permits may be granted in such municipal corporation.
